Registry: Spastic paraplegia 2  - Spastic Paraplegia Foundation, Inc.: Treatments and Therapies   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and management of various health conditions:  - Diagnostic Tests  - Drug Therapy  - Surgery and Rehabilitation  - Genetic Counseling   - Palliative Care",GHR,spastic paraplegia type 2
What is (are) adermatoglyphia ?,"Adermatoglyphia is the absence of ridges on the skin on the pads of the fingers and toes, as well as on the palms
